eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.utils

Class PolylineEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.utils.PolylineEncoder

  • public class PolylineEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods to encode and decode a polyline with Google polyline encoding/decoding scheme. See https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/utilities/polylinealgorithm

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public static java.lang.String encode(java.util.ArrayList<GeoPoint> polyline,
                      int precision)
        Encode a polyline with Google polyline encoding method
        Parameters:
        polyline - the polyline
        precision - 1 for a 6 digits encoding, 10 for a 5 digits encoding.
        Returns:
        the encoded polyline, as a String
